com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface RemoteHostInfo

public interface RemoteHostInfo

Provides details of the remote FglAM host. Used primarily within the AgentControlService context when enquiring about the FglAM host that a RemoteAgentProxy remote agent is running on

Since:
5.6.2

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getBuildNumber()
          The release build number of the remote Agent Manager
 java.lang.String getDisplayName()
          This display name used to represent the remote Agent Manager in the Foglight Server

          This is the resolved host name of the remote Agent Manager.

          The unique identifier for this remote Agent Manage
 java.lang.String getIPAddress()
          The IP Address of the remote Agent Manager

          The Operating System architecture of the remote Agent Manager

          The Operating System version of the remote Agent Manager

          Check to see if this RemoteHostInfo represents this local Agent Manager
